title: Business Competency Enhancement: Augmented Reality-based Project-type Ethnomedicine Literacy Education

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can analyze ethnic medicine-related literature to explain key concepts and social contexts.
Learners can perform and interpret antimicrobial experimentation simulations of ethnic medicine resources using augmented reality tools.
Learners can design strategies to apply traditional medical knowledge in educational settings through community-linked projects.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
